TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICustomQueryInterface

summary.span: 讓開發人員提供 [IUnknown::QueryInterface(REFIID riid, void **ppvObject)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) 方法的自訂 Managed 實作。

span.span: Enables developers to provide a custom, managed implementation of the [IUnknown::QueryInterface(REFIID riid, void **ppvObject)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別可讓進階的使用者提供的自訂 managed 的實作`QueryInterface`方法。This class permits advanced users to provide a customized managed implementation of the `QueryInterface` method. Managed 和原生應用程式可以使用自訂的實作指定的介面識別碼，除了 IID_IUnknown 傳回特定的介面。Managed and native applications can use the customized implementation to return a specific interface for a specified interface ID, except for IID_IUnknown. 也就是說，當`QueryInterface`是呼叫，它將會忽略自訂實作若其`riid`參數設定為 IID_IUnknown。That is, when `QueryInterface` is called, it will ignore custom implementations if its `riid` parameter is set to IID_IUnknown. 不過，您可能仍會傳回[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)為`ppvObject`。However, you may still return [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) as the `ppvObject`. 開發人員可以提供所有介面的自訂實作 (除了`IUnknown`) 定義並實作正確對應的介面。Developers can provide custom implementations for all interfaces (except for `IUnknown`) if they define and implement a valid corresponding interface. 有效的使用者定義介面具有確實，比對 unmanaged 的 COM 介面的 v 資料表配置和其是。A valid user-defined interface has a v-table layout that matches the unmanaged COM interface exactly, and its is .

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceResult GetInterface (ref Guid iid, out IntPtr ppv);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceResult GetInterface([in]valuetype System.Guid& iid, [out] native int& ppv) cil managed
Public Function GetInterface (ByRef iid As Guid, ByRef ppv As IntPtr) As CustomQueryInterfaceResult

span.span: The GUID of the requested interface.

param.name: ppv
param.span: 這個方法傳回時，要求之介面的參考。

span.span: A reference to the requested interface, when this method returns.

summary.span: 根據指定的介面 ID，傳回介面。

span.span: Returns an interface according to a specified interface ID.

returns.span: 其中一個列舉值，表示是否已使用 [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) 的自訂實作。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether a custom implementation of [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) was used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用 managed 程式碼，來指定它自己的自訂介面和標準執行階段介面的實作。An application can use managed code to specify its own implementation for custom interfaces and standard runtime interfaces. 傳回值可以用來啟用或停用來顯示或隱藏特定介面 COM 存取期間的自訂的實作。The return value can be used to enable or disable customized implementations by showing or hiding specific interfaces during COM access. 這個方法是看不到 com。This method is invisible to COM.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
